title: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot invoke setValue on a background thread
body:
I just run sample and get this error for each item click:

`
08-05 02:46:33.045 25265-25320/com.airbnb.lottie E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: OkHttp Dispatcher
    Process: com.airbnb.lottie, PID: 25265
    java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot invoke setValue on a background thread
        at android.arch.lifecycle.LiveData.assertMainThread(LiveData.java:435)
        at android.arch.lifecycle.LiveData.setValue(LiveData.java:279)
        at android.arch.lifecycle.MutableLiveData.setValue(MutableLiveData.java:33)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel$handleJsonResponse$1.onResult(PlayerViewModel.kt:89)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel$handleJsonResponse$1.onResult(PlayerViewModel.kt:28)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieTask.addListener(LottieTask.java:72)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel.handleJsonResponse(PlayerViewModel.kt:88)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel.access$handleJsonResponse(PlayerViewModel.kt:28)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel$fetchAnimationByUrl$2.invoke(PlayerViewModel.kt:75)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.PlayerViewModel$fetchAnimationByUrl$2.invoke(PlayerViewModel.kt:28)
        at com.airbnb.lottie.samples.OkHttpCallback.onResponse(OkHttpCallback.kt:12)
        at okhttp3.RealCall$AsyncCall.execute(RealCall.java:153)
        at okhttp3.internal.NamedRunnable.run(NamedRunnable.java:32)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1112)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:587)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:841)
`
